entry.title: Pomade No. 1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Olio E Osso
Type: pomade
Price: 27.00

Olio E Osso's first pomade has a mid-weight hold with a matte finish, is hydrating, non-greasy and adds beautiful texture and thickness. It can be used on both wet or dry hair and is easily washed out.

• Made by hand in small batches in Portland, Oregon

• 4 oz

Ingredients

Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cera Alba (Natural Beeswax), Bentonite, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Gum Resin Oil, Cedrus Deodara (Cedarwood) Bark Oil, Cupressus Sempervirens (Cypress) Leaf Oil.

Directions

Rub a small amount evenly between palms before working into hair. Distribute evenly through damp or dry hair for shorter styles or concentrate on ends for longer hair to add texture.

entry.title: Hair Smoothie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Graydon
Type: Conditioner
Price: 25.00

Hair Smoothie nourishes your lovely locks with nutrient-rich ingredients, including broccoli seed oil, while infusing your scalp with healthy hair growth essential oils of parsley, sage, rosemary and thyme. This silicone-free formulation will leave your hair super soft and smooth, but not weighed down. Great for all hair types!

• 240 ml / 8.0 fl oz

• Gluten-free

• NO nut derived ingredients

Made WITHOUT Artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulfates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

aqua (purified water), cetearyl alcohol, distearoylethyl dimonium chloride, coco-caprylate, glycerin, lauryl glucoside, polyglyceryl-2 dipolyhydroxystearate, chlorophyll, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, citric acid, *glyceryl caprylate, *glyceryl undecylenate, hydrolyzed jojoba esters, jojoba esters, brassica oleracea italica (broccoli) seed oil, camellia sinensis (matcha green tea) leaf extract, helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, olea europaea (olive) fruit oil, tocopherol (vitamin e) oil, citrus medica limonum (lemon) oil, carum petroselinum (parsley) oil, salvia sclarea (sage) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) oil, thymus vulgaris (thyme) oil *natural vegetable preservative

Directions

After shampooing with All Over Soap, apply this light conditioner to scalp and hair. Leave on for a few minutes or rinse out immediately if for fine, thin hair. If you require deeper conditioning, leave Hair Smoothie for a few hours or over night. If you have super thick, coarse hair, you can use it as a ‘leave in’ treatment to groom and style your hair.

entry.title: Natural Styling Pomade
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crux Supply Co
Type: Hair Styling
Price: 14.00

Free of petroleum, fragrances and dyes, CRUX Supply Co.'s Styling Pomade slicks and shapes hair of all types while gently infusing the scent of clary sage, rosewood, and bergamot. Made of all natural ingredients and fortified with moisturizing coconut oil, this pomade delivers a firm hold with a gentle hand. Good for your hair, your scalp, and your style.

• Made in the USA

• 2 oz

Formulated WITHOUT: Parabens, Sulfates, Artificial Fragrances, Silicones, Synthetic Dyes, Artificial Colors, Petrochemicals, & Animal Testing

Ingredients

Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Jojoba Oil, Clary Sage, Rosewood & Bergamot FCF Essential Oils.

Directions

Work into hair as needed

entry.title: Shiro Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Shampoo
Price: 12.00 - 43.00 (3 variants)

 Shiro Shampoo smells deliciously earthy and smoky and provides an addictive invigorating sensation on your scalp while leaving behind a deliciously fresh scent. Shiro Shampoo is suitable for fine, dry or normal hair.

Shiro Shampoo is handmade in Japan and is dermatologically tested.

Sort Of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed. And when you need to dispose of it, White Charcoal can be used as an excellent fertilizer.

• Made with organically produced White Charcoal powder, which is the highest grade of charcoal available.

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries-old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

• Made in Denmark

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium, Coco-Sulfate, Oak Vinegar, Glycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Phenylpropanol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Chloride

Directions

Use daily.

entry.title: Kuro Shampoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sort of Coal
Type: Shampoo
Price: 12.00 - 43.00 (3 variants)

 The Kuro Shampoo is for normal and oilier hair types with White Charcoal absorbing all dirt and excess oil and leaving hair feeling perfectly clean. Kuro Shampoo is also excellent at removing impurities from hair.

Kuro Shampoo is handmade in Japan and is dermatologically tested.

Sort Of Coal products have an efficient, waste-free lifecycle. Cross-cutting the wood to make White Charcoal is done in a thoughtful way such that the forests are restored rather than destroyed. And when you need to dispose of it, White Charcoal can be used as an excellent fertilizer.

• Made with Organically produced White Charcoal powder, which is the highest grade of charcoal available.

• White Charcoal contains more than 90 percent pure carbon and has a powerful ability to absorb due to its extremely porous surface. It is at the heart of centuries-old Asian traditions surrounding well-being and purification

• Made in Denmark

Made WITHOUT artificial preservatives, parabens, harsh chemicals, dyes, fragrance, silicone, dimethicone, phthalates, sulphates, petroleum, talc, bismuth oxychloride, nanoparticles.

Ingredients

Aqua, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium, Coco-Sulfate, Oak Vinegar, Glycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Phenylpropanol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, charcoal powder, Sodium Chloride.

Directions

Use daily.
